sqlMap.insert: insert into seller (seller_no, seller_id, seller_pw, seller_name, seller_email, seller_tel) values (seller_seq.nextval, #id#, #password#, #name#, #email#, #tel#)
sqlMap.select: select seller_no as no, seller_id as id, seller_pw as password, seller_name as name, seller_tel as tel, seller_email as email, seller_reg_date as regDate, seller_update_date as updateDate, seller_del_yn as delYn, del_rsn_no as rsnNo from seller where seller_id = #value#
